Class StatusServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • cn.edu.uestc.acmicpc.service.impl.AbstractService
      • cn.edu.uestc.acmicpc.service.impl.StatusServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StatusService, org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware

 @Transactional(rollbackFor=java.lang.Exception.class)
public class StatusServiceImpl
extends AbstractService
implements StatusService
